title: PointCloud RGB Renderer
description: PointCloudRGBRenderer defines the color of each point in a PointCloudLayer based on the value of a color attribute.

field.description: The name of the field that is used for the renderer.

fieldTransformType.description: A transform that is applied to the field value before evaluating the renderer.

pointsPerInch.description: Number of point to draw per display inch.

type.description: Specifies the type of renderer used.

colorModulationInfo_schema.json.title: colorModulationInfo
colorModulationInfo_schema.json.description: Indicates whether modulation should be used to render the point.

field.description: the attribute to use as a source for the modulation amplitude

maxValue.description: maximum value to compute modulation linear mapping

minValue.description: minimum value to compute modulation linear mapping

pointSizeAlgorithm_schema.json.title: PointCloud Size Algorithm
pointSizeAlgorithm_schema.json.description: Size algorithms for point cloud performance.

pointCloudFixedSizeAlgorithm_schema.json.title: PointCloud FixedSize Algorithm
pointCloudFixedSizeAlgorithm_schema.json.description: Render points with fixed real world or screen space size.

size.description: Symbol size in real world units or display unit

useRealWorldSymbolSizes.description: If true symbol size is in meters, display unit (pt) otherwise

pointCloudSplatAlgorithm_schema.json.title: PointCloud Splat Algorithm
pointCloudSplatAlgorithm_schema.json.description: Render points using sizes depending on point density.

minSize.description: Minimum display space point size in points

scaleFactor.description: Scale factor to applied to the computed point size (in real world)
